#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
#include<set>
#include<cmath>
#include<bitset>
#include<map>
#include<queue>
#include<stack>
#define test(t) while(t--)
#define cin(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define cout(n) prlong longf("%d\n",n)
#define rep(i,a,n) for(i=a;i<=n;i++)
#define rrep(i,a,n) for(i=a;i>=n;i--)
#define vi vector<long long>
#define vii vector< vector<long long> >
#define vpii vector< pair<long long,long long> >
#define mii map<long long,long long>
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define imax (long long) 1000000007
#define ill long long
using namespace std;
long long n,k,x;
priority_queue<long long, vector<long long>, greater<long long> > q;  
int main()
{
	long long t;
	cin >> t;
	for(long long cs = 1; cs <= t; cs++){
		cin >> n >> k; 
		for(long long i=0;i<n;i++){
			cin >> x;
			q.push(x);
		} 
		cout <<"Case " << cs << ": "; 
		long long ans = 0; 
		if((n-1) % (k-1)){
			int r = (n-1) % (k-1) + 1;
			x = 0; 
			for(int i=0;i<r;i++){
				x += q.top();
				q.pop(); 
			} 
			ans += x; 
			q.push(x);
		}
		while(q.size() > 1){
			x = 0; 
			for(long long i=0;i<k; i++){
				x += q.top();
				q.pop(); 
			}
			ans += x; 
			q.push(x); 
		}
		cout << ans << endl; 
		q.pop(); 
	}
	return 0;
}
